search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Zoho Bookings (zoho-bookings.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I couldn’t locate a direct URL for the official pricing page of Zoho Bookings. It may not have a distinct pricing page or one that's easily indexed. I recommend visiting their main website, [www.zoho.com/bookings](https://www.zoho.com/bookings/), for navigation to pricing details or contact their support for assistance.

Enhance appointment scheduling with AI
--------------------------------------

### AI-powered setup

Zoho Bookings' AI makes it even easier to start scheduling meetings. It contextually customizes your labels for staff, resources, and meeting types in your appointment booking dashboard so that the details align with your business. Customize this content as needed for a booking setup that works the way you need it to.

[Learn more](https://www.zoho.com/bookings/features/ai-appointment-scheduling.html)

A scheduling app that works 24/7 for your business!
---------------------------------------------------

*   Booking page
*   Calendar sync
*   Team scheduling
*   Workspace setup
*   Scheduling rules
*   Meet online
*   Update your CRM
*   Notify and remind
*   Collect payments

### Booking page

Create a customized page with your branding elements that shows your booking availability. Customers can choose their preferred date and time to schedule an appointment.

### Calendar sync

Sync your schedules by connecting your Google Calendar, Outlook Calendar, or Zoho Calendar, and never worry about getting double-booked.

![Image 36: Calendar sync](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/calendar-sync.png)

### Team scheduling

Share your team’s collective availability and have clients choose their favorite staff member—or assign someone for them automatically.

![Image 37: Team scheduling](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/team-scheduling.png)

### Workspace setup

Organize teams or business locations into workspaces, assign team members to specific meeting types, and grant tailored permissions (e.g., workspace admin, manager, staff).

![Image 38: Workspace setup](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/workspace-setup.png)

### Scheduling rules

Set up scheduling rules like cancellation windows, time zone presets, and scheduling intervals to get booked based on your preferences.

![Image 39: Scheduling rules](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/scheduling-rules.png)

### Meet online

Integrate video calling tools like Zoom, Google Meet, MS Teams, and Zoho Meeting to meet your customers online.

![Image 40: Meet online](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/zbs-meet-online.jpg)

### Update your CRM

Push leads to your CRM software and nurture them with meetings. Use our Zoho CRM integration or connect to your favorite CRM app with Zapier or Zoho Flow.

![Image 41: Update your CRM](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/zbs-update-your-crm-fst.jpg)

![Image 42: Update your CRM](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/zbs-update-your-crm.jpg)

### Notify and remind

Reduce no-shows with automatic emails and SMS appointment reminders. Send up to three different customized reminders for an appointment. Need to send customized emails and SMS messages for different meetings? Customize them with Zoho Bookings' notification workflows.

![Image 43: Notify and remind](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/notify-and-remind.png)

### Collect payments

Collect a deposit or a full payment upfront for your various appointment types when customers schedule an appointment.

![Image 44: Collect payments](https://www.zohowebstatic.com/sites/zweb/images/bookings/home/collect-payments.png)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

#### 1\. What is Zoho Bookings?

Zoho Bookings is an appointment scheduling software that allows businesses to schedule meetings with customers without any back-and-forth communication. Get meetings booked based on your real-time availability, and Zoho Bookings automates the rest—from sending reminder emails to collecting payments and completing other cumbersome tasks.

#### 2\. What are the benefits of Zoho Bookings?

With Zoho Bookings, you can:

*   Save time on time-consuming scheduling processes.
*   Schedule and organize your meetings from a central dashboard.
*   Manage your team members' bookings and their schedules.
*   Enhance customer experience with simplified scheduling.
*   Increase website conversions with booking widgets.
*   Automate scheduling workflows to reduce admin-related tasks around your meetings.

#### 3\. How do I get started with Zoho Bookings?

You can [sign up for a 15-day free trial](https://www.zoho.com/bookings/signup.html?utm_source=homepage_faq?utm_medium=homepage?utm_campaign=organic) with Zoho Bookings to explore all the premium features.

#### 4\. Does Zoho Bookings have a free plan?

Yes! Note that with the [Zoho Bookings free plan,](https://www.zoho.com/bookings/plan-comparison.html) you can create only one event type and connect to a single calendar. At any point, you can always upgrade to one of our paid plans.

#### 5\. What apps does Zoho Bookings integrate with?

Zoho Bookings integrates with:

*   Calendar apps like Google Calendar, Outlook Calendar, and Zoho Calendar
*   Video conferencing apps like Zoom, Google Meet, MS Teams, Zoho Meeting
*   Payment platforms like Stripe, PayPal, Razorpay, and more
*   Other Zoho apps like Zoho CRM, Zoho Desk, Zoho SalesIQ, Zoho Assist, Zoho Meeting, and more

We'll be happy to help you out.

#### 6\. Is there a paid subscription for Zoho Bookings?

Yes, Zoho Bookings offers a per-user pricing model. For more details, please visit our [pricing page.](https://www.zoho.com/bookings/pricing.html)
